Q_DESC:
To write a program in which the user has to perform operations in a linked list.
Write a program that where there are two singly linked lists in a system. By some programming error the end node of one of the linked list got linked into the second list, forming an inverted Y shaped list. Write a program to get the point where two linked list merge.
INPUT:
1 2 3 4// linked list 1
2 5 6// linked list 2
OUTPUT:
The node of intersection is 2
